alert.note: Alert for Highlands; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 4:08PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Highlands and southeastern Polk Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 407 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Indian Lake Estates to 7 miles west of Lake Placid to 7 miles west of Venus. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sebring, Lake Placid, Sebring Regional Airport, Venus, Sylvan Shores, Lake Istokpoga, Lake Josephine, Placid Lakes, Archbold, River Ranch, Lorida, and Avon Park Air Force Range. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
